spells.searchText: gift of tongues grants the target the ability to speak and understand any language they encounter. the knowledge is temporary but complete. base 15 (create language ability), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Shield of Mental Fortitude
spells.description: Creates powerful mental defenses that protect against mind control, mental intrusion, and psychic attacks. The mind becomes fortress-like.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create mental protection), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for strong defense
spells.searchText: shield of mental fortitude creates powerful mental defenses that protect against mind control, mental intrusion, and psychic attacks. the mind becomes fortress-like. base 10 (create mental protection), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for strong defense

spells.name: Vision of the Distant Scene
spells.description: Creates a mental image of a distant location the caster has visited before. The vision is current and shows what is happening now.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create distant vision), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Imaginem requisite
spells.searchText: vision of the distant scene creates a mental image of a distant location the caster has visited before. the vision is current and shows what is happening now. base 15 (create distant vision), +0 personal, +1 concentration, +1 imaginem requisite

spells.name: Dreams of Prophetic Truth
spells.description: Grants the target a prophetic dream that reveals important information about future events. The dream is symbolic but true.
spells.searchText: dreams of prophetic truth grants the target a prophetic dream that reveals important information about future events. the dream is symbolic but true. base 25 (create prophetic vision), +1 touch

spells.name: Spark of Creative Genius
spells.description: Dramatically enhances the target's creativity and artistic ability. They gain inspiration and skill in their chosen art form.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (enhance mental ability), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for artistic enhancement
spells.searchText: spark of creative genius dramatically enhances the target's creativity and artistic ability. they gain inspiration and skill in their chosen art form. base 10 (enhance mental ability), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for artistic enhancement

spells.name: Memory Palace of Perfect Order
spells.description: Creates a perfect mental filing system in the target's mind, allowing them to store and organize vast amounts of information with ease.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create mental structure), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 for complexity
spells.searchText: memory palace of perfect order creates a perfect mental filing system in the target's mind, allowing them to store and organize vast amounts of information with ease. base 20 (create mental structure), +1 touch, +4 year, +2 for complexity

spells.name: Create the Perfect Gemstone
spells.description: Creates a flawless gemstone of considerable size and beauty. The gem is real and permanent, suitable for jewelry or trade.
spells.searchText: create the perfect gemstone creates a flawless gemstone of considerable size and beauty. the gem is real and permanent, suitable for jewelry or trade. base 15 (create precious stone), +1 touch

spells.name: Wall of Protective Stone
spells.description: Creates a thick wall of solid stone that provides excellent protection. The wall is permanent until destroyed or the spell expires.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create stone structure), +2 Voice, +3 Moon, +2 for size
spells.searchText: wall of protective stone creates a thick wall of solid stone that provides excellent protection. the wall is permanent until destroyed or the spell expires. base 10 (create stone structure), +2 voice, +3 moon, +2 for size

spells.name: Earth that Swallows
spells.description: Creates a pit in solid ground that can trap enemies. The earth opens suddenly and can be closed at the caster's will.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create earth opening), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +1 for control
spells.searchText: earth that swallows creates a pit in solid ground that can trap enemies. the earth opens suddenly and can be closed at the caster's will. base 5 (create earth opening), +2 voice, +1 concentration, +1 for control

spells.name: Bridge of Eternal Stone
spells.description: Creates a magnificent stone bridge that spans great distances. The bridge is perfectly engineered and can support heavy traffic.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create major structure), +2 Voice, +4 Year, +4 for size and complexity
spells.searchText: bridge of eternal stone creates a magnificent stone bridge that spans great distances. the bridge is perfectly engineered and can support heavy traffic. base 15 (create major structure), +2 voice, +4 year, +4 for size and complexity

spells.name: Pillar of Earth's Strength
spells.description: Causes a thick pillar of stone to rise from the earth, providing support for structures or creating an elevated platform.
spells.searchText: pillar of earth's strength causes a thick pillar of stone to rise from the earth, providing support for structures or creating an elevated platform. base 10 (create stone pillar), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Forge of Endless Metal
spells.description: Creates a magical forge that produces high-quality metal continuously. The forge burns without fuel and works metal perfectly.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create metal source), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Ignem requisite
spells.searchText: forge of endless metal creates a magical forge that produces high-quality metal continuously. the forge burns without fuel and works metal perfectly. base 15 (create metal source), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 ignem requisite

spells.name: Crystal Cave of Wonders
spells.description: Creates a beautiful crystal cave filled with glowing gems and precious stones. The cave provides light and shelter.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create crystal chamber), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 Room
spells.searchText: crystal cave of wonders creates a beautiful crystal cave filled with glowing gems and precious stones. the cave provides light and shelter. base 15 (create crystal chamber), +1 touch, +4 year, +2 room

spells.name: Mend the Shattered Stone
spells.description: Repairs damage to stone structures, welding broken pieces back together and restoring them to their original strength.
spells.searchText: mend the shattered stone repairs damage to stone structures, welding broken pieces back together and restoring them to their original strength. base 10 (repair stone), +1 touch

spells.name: Blade of Hardened Earth
spells.description: Creates a weapon from hardened earth or stone. The weapon is as sharp and durable as steel but weighs like stone.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create simple object), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for weapon quality
spells.searchText: blade of hardened earth creates a weapon from hardened earth or stone. the weapon is as sharp and durable as steel but weighs like stone. base 5 (create simple object), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for weapon quality

spells.name: Tower of the Earth's Bones
spells.description: Creates a magnificent stone tower complete with rooms, stairs, and defenses. The tower rises from the earth fully formed.

spells.name: Gold from Lead
spells.description: Transmutes base metals into gold. The transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made permanent.
spells.searchText: gold from lead transmutes base metals into gold. the transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made permanent. base 15 (transform metal), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Quarry of Endless Stone
spells.description: Creates a quarry that continuously produces high-quality building stone. The quarry replenishes itself as stone is removed.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create stone source), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary
spells.searchText: quarry of endless stone creates a quarry that continuously produces high-quality building stone. the quarry replenishes itself as stone is removed. base 15 (create stone source), +1 touch, +4 year, +4 boundary

spells.name: Aegis of the Hearth
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier around a covenant or dwelling that repels supernatural creatures and hostile magic. The barrier is invisible but potent.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (create magical protection), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary, +1 for power

spells.name: Parma Magica
spells.description: Creates a personal magical resistance that protects against hostile spells and magical effects. The protection is selective and controlled.
spells.searchText: parma magica creates a personal magical resistance that protects against hostile spells and magical effects. the protection is selective and controlled. base 3 (create magic resistance), +0 personal, +2 sun

spells.name: Gift of Vigor
spells.description: Restores magical energy to a tired magus, allowing them to cast more spells. The target regains fatigue levels as if they had rested.

spells.description: Allows multiple magi to combine their magical power for a single spell. The participants must be willing and coordinated.

spells.name: Create Vis
spells.description: Creates a small amount of raw vis of any Art. The vis is real and permanent, but creating it is extremely difficult.
spells.searchText: create vis creates a small amount of raw vis of any art. the vis is real and permanent, but creating it is extremely difficult. base 25 (create raw vis), +1 touch

spells.name: Enhance the Mystical Connection
spells.description: Strengthens an arcane connection, making it more powerful and extending its useful life. The connection becomes harder to sever.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance connection), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for strengthening

spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create magical source), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 for permanence

spells.description: Creates magical bonds that can capture and hold hostile spells or magical effects, preventing them from affecting their intended targets.
